channel.title: [317 Allstar] Is it possible to make a NPC do an emote?
channel.description:
I have two NPC's who are shops, the place I want them to stand gives me two options.
1.) I delete the two stools and place the npcs there. or 2.) I leave the chairs and place the two npcs in the chair using the sit emote

item.title: [317 Allstar] Is it possible to make a NPC do an emote?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.source: [317 Allstar] Is it possible to make a NPC do an emote?
